name: submit_imagine_mission
description: 画画任务，描绘图像的任务，使用提示词描绘图像的任务

prompt.description: natural English prompts transfered to midjourey bot to imagine a picture, e.g. Cat and Dog
prompt.extend_description: you will use fluent English to describe a picture, add beautiful prompts for user's messages, and the midjourey bot will imagine a picture based on your description, and then you will draw the picture based on the midjourey bot's imagination.
